snippet.title: Bruce Lee Lives: The fall of Hong Kong Palace gameplay (PC Game, 1989)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Bruce Lee Lives: The fall of Hong Kong Palace, Dos PC game produced by Software Toolworks in 1989 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/bruce-lee-lives-the-fall-of-hong-kong-palace/7427/
Having some training and a few fights trying to use the difficult controls.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Violent Fighter - https://youtu.be/eKB1VlW_W3w
Sango Fighter - https://youtu.be/rWCQdHdPzqg
Bushido - https://youtu.be/cVjjcyBk128
